title: Logging on to chat...
body: Can't log on to chat service - 2-17...have tried many of the fixes found online with no success...help please!

replies.body: Are you getting any specific errors, something about pvp.net?  It sounds like your network might be having issues specifically reaching pvp.net, which is what the chat service uses.  Go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is configured to allow access, and download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help with that.  Let me know if you have any questions!

No specific error, everything works except chat pre-game
When game loads I get a message on bot that says "logging into chat service"...but it never logs in...
Thanks for the follow up!  The above suggestions in this case should help towards resolving the chat service issues.  I hope that helps!
